original_text:
You were blameless in your ways
    from the day you were created
    till wickedness was found in you.
korean_text: 네가 지음을 받던 날로부터 네 모든 길에 완전하더니 마침내 네게서 불의가 드러났도다

sentences.original_text: You were blameless in your ways
from the day you were created
till wickedness was found in you
